title: Cathedral: a collection
description: Cathedral is a collection of poetry and creative prose about beauty in the midst of grief and joy in the face of great sorrow.oh brave one,oh broken, beautifully brave one,remember.remember that no matter how tiny the fragments this time,how far apart they are scattered,how long you must search,he will help you find the pieces of the person you once wereand the image you once bore.// to the broken ones
author: Maya Joelle
